name: [GameDev.tv] Cubedude Kickabout
description:
This is My take on GameDev.Tv's "Cubedude Kickabout" from their Godot course! All of the Assets were provided by the course.

This one was my first 3d game in godot! It was a lot more strighforward then I expected (as almost anything in Godot!), and it was quite fun to do!

If you're interested in learning Godot, their course has been great for me! You can find it at Udemy!
